channel.title: Arrows -- W\ GFX! -- Read please :P
channel.description:
Yes, im back.. W\ MORE QUESTIONS! Woot :P..
Alright, lol, nothing too complicated...
I was wondering if you could make arrows have a gfx... Example..
You shoot a rune arrow at your enemy, and it does a certain GFX on YOUR ENEMY, when it hits them...
Is that possible?.. If so, please post how

item.title: Arrows -- W\ GFX! -- Read please :P
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Okaii, 4th page and still nothing
Ive had help… I added this… under else if(HasArrows){ 

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == ####) {
stillgfx(###, EnemyX, EnemyY);
}

And that is still not working…

Any ideas?

Obviously i have changed the “####'s”

Read full topic

item.title: Arrows -- W\ GFX! -- Read please :P

item.description:
@Bobbert wrote:

Yes i belive it is possible im not sure how but look thought a gfx list and then i suggest you add the gfx’s like you would with magic ,
